content:
Hi all! This still has some rough edges, but anyway:
http://angg.twu.net/LATEX/2021groth-tops-children.pdf
It is about a way to visualize Grothendieck topologies, nuclei, and Lawvere-Tierney topologies.
Any feedback would be super-welcome.

Here's a Grothendieck topology and the Lawvere-Tierney topology associated to it:
sshot.png
